name: The House of Busirane
description:
My final project for English-333 based off of Book 3 of Edmund Spenser's The Faerie Queene. Use mouse right click to zoom,  Cmd + Q to quit. Be prepared for a lot of red.

Here is video walkthrough in case application does not work: Busirane Walkthrough

Not related to this project, but Satyrane is the best character in that book.
